measures.1: Keep in upright position at all times
measures.3: Do not add pure water (Pure water level should be 1.5 cm above plates)

measures.5: Wear protective clothing if there is a risk of acid splashing

general.0: Always store upright in a dry and cool place (10°C - 25°C)

installation.5: Install new battery (connect positive cable first)
